overview: A7X.RU Release Group presents:  The Double-DVD set compilation contains over 3 hours of pro-shot footage of an american band Avenged Sevenfold. The project was made by russian fans for all the fans over the World.  Name: Decade of A7X: 6661-2009  Type: Unofficial fanmade DVD, pro-shot  Release: May 7th, 2011 (2011-05-07)  Size: 2DVD, 197 min.
title: Avenged Sevenfold - Decade Of A7X
